PISTOL.strategy: **2-1-2 Setup**: 2 players A1 (quad/site), 1 player ivy, 2 players B upper (ramp/site). Ivy player calls rotations.
**Aggressive Ivy**: 3 players ivy (connector control), 1 player A1, 1 player B upper. Ivy players push for picks.
**Stack A1**: 3 players A1 site (quad, default, close), 2 players ivy/B. Focus on A1 retakes.
**Connector Hold**: 2 players A1, 2 players ivy/connector, 1 player B upper. Ivy players hold aggressively.
**Anti-Rush A1**: 3 players A1 (close angles), 1 player ivy, 1 player B upper. A1 players crossfire rushes.
**Rotational**: 1 player A1, 2 players ivy, 2 players B upper. Mobile defense, fast rotates.
**Lower Control**: 2 players A1, 2 players ivy, 1 player lower. Lower player holds tunnels aggressively.
**B Heavy**: 1 player A1, 1 player ivy, 3 players B upper. Force A1 plays, fast rotates.
**Quad Focus**: 2 players A1 (quad control), 2 players ivy, 1 player B upper. Quad player AWP/rifle.
**Info Play**: 2 players A1, 1 player ivy, 2 players B upper. Conservative angles, information focus.

ECO.strategy: **Stack A1 Close**: 4 players A1 site (close angles), 1 player B upper. Upgraded pistols, close trades.
**Aggressive Ivy**: 3 players ivy with upgraded pistols, 2 players save. Ivy players push connector.
**B Stack Save**: 1 player A1 (save), 4 players B upper/ramp close angles. Upgraded pistols B.
**Connector Push**: 2 players A1, 3 players ivy (connector push). Ivy players armor+pistol, aggressive contact.
**Anti-Force A1**: 3 players A1 close, 2 players ivy/B save. A1 players upgraded pistols, crossfires.
**Full Save**: All save completely. 2 A1, 1 ivy, 2 B upper. Passive angles, survival focus.
**Lower Push**: 2 players A1, 2 players ivy, 1 player lower (push). Lower player upgraded pistol.
**Ramp Control**: 2 players A1, 1 player ivy, 2 players B upper (ramp push). Ramp players upgraded pistols.
**Retake Focus**: 2 players A1, 1 player ivy, 2 players B upper. All save, retake utility coordination.
**Mixed Buy**: 2 players A1 (1 upgraded), 2 players ivy (1 upgraded), 1 player B upper save.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **Rifle Ivy**: 2 players A1 (1 rifle), 2 players ivy (1 rifle), 1 player B upper (SMG). Rifles long angles.
**A1 Heavy**: 3 players A1 (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 1 player ivy (rifle), 1 player B upper (SMG). Strong A1 hold.
**Connector Control**: 2 players A1 (SMGs), 3 players ivy (2 rifles, 1 SMG). Ivy rifles hold connector.
**Anti-Execute**: 2 players A1 (1 rifle), 2 players ivy (1 rifle), 1 player B upper (SMG). Rifles long, SMGs retake.
**Lower Rifle**: 2 players A1 (SMGs), 2 players ivy (1 rifle), 1 player lower (rifle). Lower rifle tunnels.
**Balanced**: 2 players A1 (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 2 players ivy (1 rifle, 1 SMG), 1 player B upper (rifle).
**B Heavy**: 2 players A1 (SMGs), 1 player ivy (rifle), 2 players B upper (1 rifle, 1 SMG). Strong B defense.
**Quad Rifle**: 2 players A1 (1 rifle quad), 2 players ivy (1 rifle), 1 player B upper (SMG). Quad rifle picks.
**Aggressive Ivy**: 2 players A1 (SMGs), 3 players ivy (2 rifles push). Ivy rifles take map control.
**Retake Setup**: 2 players A1 (1 rifle), 1 player ivy (rifle), 2 players B upper (1 rifle, 1 SMG).

FULL_BUY.strategy: **Standard 2-1-2**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 1 player ivy (AWP), 2 players B upper (rifles). AWP connector/ivy.
**A1 Heavy**: 3 players A1 (rifles + utility), 1 player ivy (rifle), 1 player B upper (rifle). Strong A1 defense.
**Ivy Control**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 3 players ivy (AWP + 2 rifles). Heavy ivy presence.
**Connector Deny**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 2 players ivy (rifles + utility), 1 player B upper (rifle). Smoke connector.
**Anti-Split**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 2 players ivy (rifles), 1 player B upper (rifle + utility). Split defense.
**AWP Quad**: 2 players A1 (1 AWP quad, 1 rifle), 2 players ivy (rifles), 1 player B upper (rifle). Quad AWP.
**Lower Control**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 2 players ivy (rifles), 1 player lower (rifle + utility). Heavy lower utility.
**B Stack**: 1 player A1 (rifle), 2 players ivy (rifles), 2 players B upper (rifles). Force A1 plays.
**Retake Heavy**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 1 player ivy (rifle), 2 players B upper (rifles + utility). Retake focus.
**Aggressive Setup**: 2 players A1 (rifles), 2 players ivy (rifles push), 1 player B upper (rifle). Ivy map control.

PISTOL.strategy: **A1 Rush**: All 5 players buy armor, rush A1 main with coordinated pop-flashes. Clear quad/default quickly.
**B Rush Upper**: 4 players rush B upper with armor and flashes, 1 player A1 for late rotate.
**Ivy Control**: 3 players ivy with utility, 2 players A1. Ivy players smoke connector, take ivy control.
**A Split**: 2 players A1, 3 players ivy to connector. A1 players smoke quad, coordinate timing.
**Lower Control**: 3 players lower with utility, 2 players A1. Lower players smoke tunnels, take control.
**B Default**: 2 players B upper, 2 players ivy, 1 player A1. Play for picks and information.
**Connector Rush**: 4 players ivy to connector with pop-flashes, 1 player B upper. Connector players coordinate.
**A1 Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A1 with utility, 2 players position ivy. Execute B after rotations.
**Upper Control**: 3 players B upper focusing on ramp area, 2 players A1. Upper players coordinate pop-flashes.
**Anti-Stack**: 2 players A1, 2 players B upper, 1 player ivy. Create pressure from multiple angles.

ECO.strategy: **Five-Seven A1 Rush**: Everyone buys Five-Seven + armor. Rush A1 together with pop-flashes.
**Stack B Upper**: All 5 players stack B upper area. Buy upgraded pistols + armor. Play close angles.
**Ivy Lurk**: 1 player lurks ivy with upgraded pistol, 4 players force buy A1.
**Deagle Ivy**: 2 players buy Deagle + armor ivy, 3 players support. Deagles take long angles connector.
**Lower Control**: 4 players buy armor + upgraded pistols lower, 1 player saves.
**Anti-Force A1**: 3 players buy armor + Five-Seven A1, 2 players save. Force players smoke quad.
**Upper Contact**: 2 players buy armor + upgraded pistols B upper, 3 players save.
**Connector Contact**: 3 players buy armor + upgraded pistols ivy, 2 players save.
**Split Save**: 2 players force A1, 2 players force B upper, 1 player saves ivy.
**Full Save**: All players save completely. 2 A1, 2 B upper, 1 ivy. Exit frags only.

HALF_BUY.strategy: **A1 Control**: 3 players buy rifles, 2 players SMGs. 2 rifles A1, 1 rifle ivy, SMGs support.
**Ivy Presence**: 2 rifles ivy, 2 SMGs A1, 1 rifle B upper. Ivy rifles smoke connector, take control.
**B Upper Take**: 2 rifles B upper, 2 SMGs ivy, 1 rifle A1. Upper rifles clear ramp, take B control.
**Lower Control**: 3 players lower (2 rifles, 1 SMG), 2 SMGs A1. Lower players smoke tunnels.
**Pick Heavy**: Spread rifles for picks. 1 rifle A1, 1 rifle ivy, 1 rifle B upper, 2 SMGs floating.
**A1 Focus**: 4 players A1 (2 rifles, 2 SMGs), 1 rifle ivy. A1 players smoke quad.
**Connector Split**: 2 rifles ivy, 2 SMGs A1, 1 rifle B upper. Execute A split through connector.
**Anti-Full Buy**: 2 rifles long angles, 3 SMGs close angles. Use utility to isolate duels.
**Ramp Control**: 2 rifles B upper, 2 SMGs ivy, 1 rifle A1. Upper rifles take ramp control.
**Utility Heavy**: 2 rifles, 3 SMGs with heavy utility. Rifles key angles, SMGs support.

FULL_BUY.strategy: **A1 Execute**: Smoke quad + connector, flash over smokes. 3 players A1, 2 players connector.
**Ivy Control**: 3 players ivy with full utility, 2 players A1. Ivy players smoke connector + A site.
**B Upper Execute**: 4 players B upper with full utility, 1 player ivy lurk. Upper players smoke ramp + site.
**Lower Split**: 2 players lower, 3 players ivy to A. Smoke tunnels + connector, execute A split.
**Default Setup**: 2 A1, 2 ivy, 1 B upper. AWPer ivy or A1, riflers support.
**A1 Fake to B**: 3 players make noise A1 with utility, 2 players position B upper. Execute B.
**Connector Control**: 4 players ivy with full utility, 1 player A1 lurk. Ivy players smoke connector + quad.
**Popdog Execute**: 3 players A1, 2 players popdog from lower. Smoke quad + popdog, execute A from two angles.
**Anti-Stack A**: Heavy utility on A1, 4 players execute A site. 1 player ivy watches rotations.
**Late Round B**: Play default until 30 seconds, then all 5 execute B through upper.
